title: Skills & Strengths
text: The world of technology, data, and marketing is constantly evolving, and I am passionate about staying current, experimenting with new tools, and combining technical capabilities with strategic vision. These are some of the skills I have developed and continue to strengthen:

title: Skills & Strengths
text:
Soft Skills






Key Strengths



Leadership: Natural ability to lead, guide, and motivate multidisciplinary teams toward common goals
Analytical Thinking: Strong capacity to break down complex problems and make data-driven decisions
Adaptability: Experience working in diverse environments, from hospitals in Colombia to academic and cultural settings in the U.S. and Canada
Effective Communication: Skilled in translating technical concepts into clear value propositions for diverse audiences
Strategic Vision: Combining business education (Marketing + MBA) with technical expertise (engineering) to design impactful solutions

title: Projects
text:
Below are my main areas of interest and featured projects that combine data analysis, e-commerce, and cloud technologies.


Business Analytics (2024)
Tools: Tableau, SQL
As part of my MBA analytics focus, I explored Airbnb‚Äôs New York City data to uncover trends in pricing, occupancy, and host performance. The dashboards show key insights: premium areas earning over $300 a night and Brooklyn‚Äôs competitive market averaging around $127.

Presented at a national research symposium (COLSI).

title: About Me
text:
Biomedical engineer and MBA student with a passion for technology and healthcare.
Originally from Colombia and now based in Canada, I combine a background in Biomedical Engineering and Marketing with ongoing studies in Business Administration. I have experience working in clinics, hospitals, and leading technical sales and projects for specialized medical devices.


MBA ‚Äì University Canada West (2024‚Äì2025)

I enjoy working in multicultural environments and integrating analytics and strategy to solve real-world challenges. My career reflects adaptability, leadership, and a focus on results.

title: Lucia Ceron - MBA Portfolio
text:
Beyond academics and professional projects, I have been committed to initiatives that combine leadership, logistics, and social impact. These experiences shaped my ability to lead under pressure and serve my community.



During the COVID-19 pandemic, I led a team of engineers to coordinate, train, and oversee the installation of approximately 300 mechanical ventilators across hospitals in multiple regions of Colombia. As the project lead, I managed planning, resource allocation, and on-site execution, ensuring that life-saving equipment reached medical teams quickly and effectively .
Figure 1: Ventilator Deployment Project During COVID-19

Note: The video ‚ÄúVentilator Deployment Project During COVID-19‚Äù (InformativoSinCensura Popay√°n, 2020)




In my hometown, I actively participated in community service through my school, a local convent-run institution. Working with classmates and mentors, we organized health brigades, food and household supply drives, and visits to vulnerable families, delivering essential resources to those most in need.



Community service activities


Note. Adapted from Prezi presentation Laicos Misioneros San Jos√© de Tarbes. Retrieved from https://prezi.com/cq4ntvd2u4xr/laicos-misioneros-san-jose-de-tarbes/.
